Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;5.07. Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders. On March&#160;30, 2020, Broadcom Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) held its 2020 Annual Meeting of Stockholders. Holders of the Company&#8217;s shares of common stock voted on the following matters: (1) To elect 9 members to the Company&#8217;s board of directors; (2) To ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as the Company&#8217;s independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending November&#160;1, 2020; (3) Non-binding, advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Company&#8217;s named executive officers. For each of these proposals a quorum was present. The votes cast in connection with such matters were as follows: (1) Election of Directors : &#160; Name &#160; For &#160; &#160; Against &#160; &#160; Abstain &#160; &#160; Broker &#160;Non-Votes &#160; (a) &#160; Hock E. SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized.
